title: about me
text:
Miles (b. 1997) is a maker borne and based out of Asheville, NC. 

 He works predominantly with natural fiber, wood, metal, and reclaimed materials to create utilitarian objects. 

 contactâ†’ studio@mileskm.me

wool.title: wool
wool.text:
Wool study: processing a raw boarder leicester fleece into yarn and felt.

 6 lbs of raw wool. 
Single spun worsted and 2-ply fingering weight yarns.
 (2025)

hubba.title: hubba hubba bags
hubba.text:
Collection of 8 nylon shoulder bags created from a retired hubba hubba nx tent.

21" x 25"
(2025)

scrap sling.title: scrap sling
scrap sling.text:

handlebar bag.title: handlebar bag
handlebar bag.text:
Waterproof handlebar bag made from reversed RX30 XPAC and 420D robic. Structure from tent pole and cutting board

(2024)

overnight bag.title: backpack
overnight bag.text:
ultralight backpacking pack made from dyneema, ripstop, and reclaimed foam.
